channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Registrar: Add/Drop (No W Grade) Deadline is January 20
item.description: The Registrar’s Office reminds students that the Spring 2025 add/drop (no W grade) deadline is January 20, 2025; students will be able to drop courses after this date, but will be issued a W grade. More detailed add/drop information is available via the Registrar’s Office website.
item.author: Students

item.title: Therapy Dog Sessions Continue January 16
item.description: Date: Thursday, January 16, 2025 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM - Join other students in the Mueller Center classroom to relax, de-stress, and pet some furry friends! If you have any questions or would like more information, please contact Emma Atkinson in the Mueller Center.
item.author: Students

item.title: Red & White Student Organization to Hold Info Session
item.description: Date: Thursday, January 16, 2025 6:00 PM - 6:30 PM - If you’re interested in joining the Red & White Student Organization, be sure to stop by room 3202 of the Student Union to learn what Red & White is and how the group is involved in our community, and how you can join!
item.author: Students

item.title: $5 Mayor’s Cup Tickets Available to RPI Students
item.description: A limited amount of specially-priced tickets for the 2025 Mayor’s Cup hockey game will be on sale to Rensselaer students at a table on the first floor of the Student Union from 9:30AM to 12:30PM this Tuesday and Thursday!
item.author: Students

item.title: SWE, Sensata to Hold General Body Meeting
item.description: Date: Thursday, January 16, 2025 5:30 PM - 6:30 PM - Join SWE and Sensata for this career-oriented meeting discussing topics related to Technical Interviewing and what Engineers and companies look for during these interviews! Food will be provided, so please register if you are interested in attending to ensure we have enough for everyone!
item.author: Students

item.title: Spring 2025 URP Applications Now Being Accepted
item.description: The Office of Undergraduate Education is currently accepting Undergraduate Research Program (URP) applications for the Spring 2025 semester! Full- and part-time undergraduate students may pursue research for academic credit or as a paid research assistant. Visit Undergraduate Research Program for more information. Application deadline is Monday, January 20, 2025.
item.author: Students

item.title: Send Your Research High with RPI Spaceflight Society!
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 (all day) - The Spaceflight Society is currently developing a proposal for NASA’s CubeSat Launch Initiative and is actively searching for research to conduct in orbit! If you think your work could benefit from going orbital, or have an interesting idea that the satellite could investigate, please contact the Spaceflight Society!
item.author: Students

item.title: MANE Stribling Distinguished Lecture Slated for January 15
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 10:30 AM - 11:30 AM - Eleonora Botta, of the University of Buffalo, will present “Towards autonomous tether-based active debris removal: modeling, simulation, estimation, and control.”
item.author: Students

item.title: Wang Named Editor-in-Chief of IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging
item.description: Ge Wang, the Clark-Crossan Chaired Professor and director of the Biomedical Imaging Center at Rensselaer, has been appointed as the editor-in-chief of the IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging journal, the flagship journal in the tomographic medical imaging field and among the most highly cited of all biomedical engineering journals. Wang’s initial term is for three years and is renewable for a second term.
item.author: Community

item.title: Quantum One Computer Scheduled for Maintenance January 8 and 15
item.description: IBM will be performing system maintenance on all quantum computers, including RPI’s Quantum One computer, from 6am to 2pm ET on January 8, and from 9am to 2pm ET on January 15. All QPUs will be unavailable during these times, and users will be unable to submit or retrieve jobs during the maintenance.
item.author: Community

item.title: Volunteers Needed for the VEX Robotics Tournament!
item.description: RPI Robotics will be hosting the area’s largest VEX high school robotics competition on Monday, January 20, and is looking for volunteers for the event! No experience is required, and volunteers receive free food and a T-shirt for helping out; please see the Volunteer Interest form for more information and to sign up, and thanks in advance for your help!
item.author: Community

item.title: January 15 Presentation to Feature Dr. Sally Temple
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM - Attend this event in the Iserrman Auditorium for an insightful presentation by Dr. Sally Temple on “Neurodegenerative Disease Modeling with Brain Organoids.” Dr. Temple’s work focuses on using brain organoids to model neurodegenerative diseases, providing valuable insights into disease mechanisms and potential therapeutic approaches.
item.author: Community

item.title: HR, CDPHP to Hold In-Person Brunch with Benefits January 21
item.description: The Division of Human Resources invites faculty and staff to our next in-person Brunch with Benefits session on Tuesday, January 21, 2025. Led by Ms. Carly Samach, LMHC, we’ll discuss “Disrupting the Cycle of Burnout”. Representatives from CDPHP will also be on hand. Registration is required and limited!
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: HR Professional Development Seminar, “Supervisory Essentials,” to be Held January 22
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 22, 2025 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM - Managers and Supervisors will learn from each other and our Facilitators abou topics such as the Employee Value Proposition and Employee Experience and the six fundamental Leadership competencies at Rensselaer, as well as experience a “day in the life” of a Supervisor. The importance of managing employee performance, providing rewards and recognition, and employment law fundamentals and tools for building team capacity will also be explored.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Faculty/Staff Webinar to Highlight Ways to Handle Student Absences
item.description: Date: Thursday, January 16, 2025 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM - Register to join Undergraduate Education’s Maureen Fodera as she offers strategies faculty can use to deal with student absences.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: HR Posts Important Update Regarding Dental Coverage
item.description:
As communicated in 2024, Rensselaer’s new dental coverage provider is MetLife as of January 1, 2025. Enrolled faculty and staff should visit the Dental Plans section of the Human Resources website for instructions on how to search for providers, register for a MetLife MyBenefits account online, and access your ID cards.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
